title: OneUp Components 11-Speed SRAM Drop Bar Dropper Paddle Remote
content:
Getting a dropper post to work with your drop bar setup can require any number of weird levers or hacks but OneUp makes it easy. As long as you’ve got SRAM 11-speed. Let’s check out the new Drop Bar Paddle Remote…

This integrated dropper remote fits in the brake hood of your SRAM™ 11-speed hydraulic drivetrain. It has an integrated cable tensioner to eliminate the need for a barrel adjuster and allows you to run a dropper, even if you have fully internal cable routing. Best of all, installation is a cinch with the supplied instructions. The end of the cable clamps to this paddle, eliminating the need for finicky clamping barrel nuts.

Compatibility

  • SRAM Red 11spd Hydro R
  • SRAM Force 11spd Hydro R
  • SRAM Rival 11spd Hydro R
  • SRAM Apex 11spd Hydro R
  • Not compatible with ETap or Apex 12spd
  • Not compatible with Shimano

Price

  • MSRP USD – 69.99
  • MSRP CAD – 95.99

In stock now at oneupcomponents.com with free shipping worldwide and available from your local bike shop.
